parameters.name: DeleteJobs
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to delete the jobs in the application group. Valid values:

true: deletes the jobs in the application group.
false: does not delete the jobs in the application group.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can obtain the ID of the application on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace. You can obtain the ID of the namespace on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.
